DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of the study is to assess the activity of XRP9881 in combination with trastuzumab. The secondary objectives are safety and pharmacokinetic interaction
DOC.brief_title: XRP9881 in Combination With Trastuzumab in Metastatic Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: Metastatic breast cancer (MBC) HER2 (Human Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor 2) positive: FISH (Fluorescent In Situ Hybridization) positive or IHC (Immunohistochemistry) 3+ Measurable disease according to Response Evaluation Criteria In Solid Tumors (RECIST) Adequate organs functions More than one previous chemotherapy regimen for metastatic disease Cardiac dysfunction
